name: hazard_zone_report_provider
title: What company will provide the Natural Hazard Zone Disclosure Report(s)?
label: Report Provider
description: If you don't know, leave it blank for the seller to fill in.
tips: Natural hazard disclosure reports are typically provided by specialized companies.
small_print: The provider should be licensed to provide natural hazard disclosure reports in California.

internal.notes: Selection of natural hazard report provider

hazard_zone_report_provider.name: hazard_zone_report_provider

suggested.hint: This field is optional, so you may leave it empty. However, filling it out could strengthen your offer and expedite its processing.

hazard_zone_report_provider.tooltip: Enter the name of the hazard report provider
